TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaImporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter

summary.span: 为 XML 架构元素声明（包括 WSDL 文档中的文本 XSD 消息部分）生成到 .NET Framework 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)和时从 Web 服务描述语言 （生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类的类WSDL) 文档。The class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) and the class while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 类还由[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)时从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成类。The class is also used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) while generating classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents. 而不是直接使用此类，使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. 类具有要生成内部映射到 XSD 文档中或为部件 WSDL 文档中定义的元素的.NET Framework 类型的方法。The class has methods to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a WSDL document. 以下列表说明类由 Wsdl.exe:The following list shows when the class is used by Wsdl.exe: - WSDL 文档中指定文本的用法，使用 XML 架构定义按原义指定的 SOAP 消息参数和返回值 （或请求和响应文档） 的内容。A WSDL document specifies literal use, where the content of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) is literally specified with XML schema definitions. - 以 WSDL 文档指定 Web 服务通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的.NET Framework 的非 SOAP 的实现。A WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 对象的集合。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，采用 对象的集合，表示 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 文本消息所使用的 XML 架构。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking a collection of objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP literal messages defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WSDL 文档指定的数据序列化根据架构时使用此构造函数 (\)。Use this constructor when a WSDL document specifies that the data is serialized according to a schema (\). 而不是直接创建的实例类，而使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of directly creating an instance of the class, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe.

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的单个 (SOAP) 文本元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single, (SOAP) literal element part defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: 表示 WSDL 消息定义中单个元素部分的 .NET Framework 类型映射的 。

span.span: An representing the .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时由 Wsdl.exe 工具使用方法。The method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe. WSDL 文档指定使用文本时才使用类。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 当 WSDL 消息具有单个部件元素但一部分未被识别为包装元素使用方法。The method is used when a WSDL message has a single part element but the part has not been identified as a wrapper element.

summary.span: 为 XML 架构文档中定义的元素或作为 WSDL 文档的部分的元素生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for an element defined in an XML schema document or as a part in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载Xsd.exe 工具使用方法从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成的类。This overload of the method is used by the Xsd.exe tool to generate classes from an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Xsd.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载Xsd.exe 工具使用方法从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成的类。This overload of the method is used by the Xsd.exe tool to generate classes from an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 它还使用 Wsdl.exe 工具生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档时。It also is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Wsdl.exe 或 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe or Xsd.exe.

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the element parts of a literal-use SOAP message defined in a WSDL document.

WSDL 文档指定使用文本时才使用类。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. WSDL 消息包装单部分元素中时，将使用此重载。This overload is used when a WSDL message is wrapped within a single part element.

WSDL 文档指定使用文本时才使用类。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies literal use. 值`names`参数包含 WSDL 文档中的消息定义下的部分元素的限定的名称。The value of the `names` parameter contains the qualified names of the parts elements under a message definition in a WSDL document. 此方法不考虑一部分元素的类型。This method does not account for the part elements' types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Xsd.exe 工具生成的类 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档时使用方法。The method is used by the Xsd.exe tool while generating classes XML Schema Definition (XSD) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Xsd.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Xsd.exe. 此方法不考虑 XML 架构元素的类型。This method does not account for the XML schema element's type.
